title: A Dagger in the Dark
description: The fallout from the Masquerade points to the Shrouded Lyceum. The Hand is fractured but cornered. They are activating their sleeper agents to assassinate the remaining loyal Councilors.

turns.narrative: You rush to Councilor Voss's estate in the Academic Quarter. You find the outer guards dead. The door is locked from the inside.
turns.choice_a: Smash through the heavy oak doors (Strength)
turns.consequence_a: You burst in, stunning two assassins inside, but taking taking splinter damage.
turns.choice_b: Scale the wall to the second-floor balcony
turns.consequence_b: You slip in silently, ambushing the assassins tracking Voss.

turns.narrative: Voss is bleeding out on the floor. Standing over him is 'The Whisperer', the Hand's elite executioner.
turns.consequence_a: Voss stabilizes, but The Whisperer gets a free critical strike on you.
turns.consequence_b: You engage in brutal combat, but Voss slowly bleeds out during the fight.

voss_saved.description: You defeated the executioner and saved Councilor Voss.

voss_dead.description: The executioner is dead, but Councilor Voss bled out.

conclusion: You defeated the executioner and saved Councilor Voss.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
